mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evacomment (comNum, comWriter, comContent, comTarget_id, comRef_group, comComment_group ,comSort_group, regdate) VALUES(#{comNum}, #{comWriter}, #{comContent}, #{comTarget_id}, #{comRef_group}, #{comComment_group},sort_comment_seq.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT comNum, comWriter, comContent, comTarget_id, comRef_group, comComment_group, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY"/"MM"/"DD" "HH24":"MI') AS regdate FROM evacomment WHERE comRef_group = #{num} ORDER BY comSort_group asc
